title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 36-2.1 - Application
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 36-2.1 - Application

State Regulations

The provisions of Subpart 36-2 apply to all structures
containing or constituting places of public assembly. They are applicable to
existing and new structures unless otherwise herein specifically stated. Certain occupancies are subject to the special requirements of Subpart
36-3. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
§§
36-2.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
